reference.title: updateAnchors Method
reference.shortdesc: Use the updateAnchors method to add sidenoted content to the page dynamically.

section.p: This method is useful for pagination, or in other cases where sidenote-able content is added to the page dynamically. This method defines new anchors for the matched elements, and takes a single argument: newSelectors.

newSelectors. The selectors to add to Sidenotes. This may be a selector string, a jQuery object, or an array of elements (any of the types accepted by the selectors argument passed during app construction).
section.codeblock: var app = new Livefyre.Sidenotes(convConfig);// Load more contentapp.updateAnchors('#content');
